channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for AK
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for AK

item.title: Report X-2025030336
item.description:
Report X-2025030336

Identified by scraper @ 2025-03-16T21:12:33+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2025-02-26
  • City: ANCHORAGE
  • State: AK
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Air
  • Carrier/Reporter: FEDERAL EXPRESS CORPORATION
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: On February 26th, a FedEx Express package was discovered by US Customs that contained 224 botts of perfumery products that were not marked or labeled as dangerous goods. The package contained 224 bottles of perfume each bottle containing 80ml of liquid. The package is being held pending investigation.
